historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following ยง 47-2887.01.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon ยง 3 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act. See Vol. 7, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 47-2887.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: By acting as an athlete agent in the District of Columbia, a nonresident individual appoints the Mayor as the individual's agent for service of process in any civil action in the District of Columbia related to the individual's acting as an athlete agent in the District of Columbia.
The Mayor may issue subpoenas for any material that is relevant to the administration of this part.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
